text: The Evil Dead is a 2013 American horror movie. It is about five friends who stay at a remote cabin. This movie was at first rated NC-17, but changes were made so the movie would get an R rating from the MPAA. Evil Dead was also rated "18" by the BBFC (UK) and rated "R" in Australia. This movie got positive reviews by the critics. It is a remake of 1981 movie Evil Dead. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2013 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Supernatural horror movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:American movie remakes
title: Evil Dead (2013 movie)
